item.title: XClip in Fish Shell
item.description: Wondered if you could just copy the output of a bash command to clipboard and paste it somewhere. XClip is here for your rescue. The Fish Shell 3.0 now supports xclip. How to use : For copying $pwd | xclip Paste it $cd (xclip -o) PS: In fish to execute a string as a command use paranthesis "( )" instead of backticks “ ` ` “.
